div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1665 Egypt, 1893 (363) Burial: c. 318 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 44 AR. A single hoard? Alexander III: 44 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 21, Pella 1, Side 3, Tarsus 1, Citium 2, Da- mascus 2, Aradus 3, Babylon 8, Alex- andreia 3) Disposition: unknown Dutilh, AN 1895, pp. 73-92 (esp. p. 73, table A, Muller nos.; some illus.
